ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: AFLP data matrix of Eichhornia crassipes
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: AFLP data matrix of 49 water hyacinth (Eichhornia crassipes) populations from its native and introduced ranges. If you have any problem with the data, please contact zhang@ips.unibe.ch.
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:subject: Population Genetics - Empirical
Plant Mating Systems
Natural Selection and Contemporary Evolution
Invasive Species
